bioconda.name: bioconductor-geoquery
bioconda.summary: Get data from NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO)

biotools.summary: The NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) is a public repository of microarray data. Given the rich and varied nature of this resource, it is only natural to want to apply BioConductor tools to these data. This tool is the bridge between GEO and BioConductor.

bioschemas.name: GEOquery
bioschemas.summary: The NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) is a public repository of microarray data. Given the rich and varied nature of this resource, it is only natural to want to apply BioConductor tools to these data. This tool is the bridge between GEO and BioConductor.
